discussion_comments.comment_body: No, we need to allow for breaking changes in huggingface_hub meaning we can do `>=0.17,<0.18` instead.

commented_code:

+numpy = "0.16.2"
+ndarray = "0.15"
 onig = { version = "6.0", default-features = false }

+itertools = "0.10"

discussion_comments.comment_body:
I would very much rather we update dependencies in separate PRs. 

When updating dependencies, I need to make sure nothing breaks upstream either.
This PR will update `pyo3` but if we could leave out the other dependencies not required for other PRs it would be easier to check. (One single PR for all other dependencies is fine).
